author: Lauren Huff
title: Full House cast gives show's opening credits a quarantine makeover
description: In a clip originally posted on TikTok as part of the video-sharing platform's 'Full House' challenge, most of the original cast and series creator Jeff Franklin recreate the show's iconic opening title sequence with a quarantine twist.
content:
It's been almost 25 years since Full House went off the air, but it's still proving to be a source of joy after all this time.
